verbs.description: As [ARG0: the Trump White House] [V: envisions] [ARG1: it] , Trump will run annual deficits of more than $ 900 billion for the rest of the term he was elected to in 2016 .

As the Trump White House envisions it , Trump will run annual deficits of more than $ 900 billion for the rest of the term [ARG1: he] was [V: elected] [ARG2: to] [ARGM-TMP: in 2016] .
